Rio de Janeiro.name: Copacabana
Rio de Janeiro.description: Famous beach neighborhood with iconic promenade, luxury hotels, and vibrant nightlife

Rio de Janeiro.name: Ipanema
Rio de Janeiro.description: Upscale beach neighborhood with designer boutiques, trendy restaurants, and stunning sunsets

Rio de Janeiro.name: Leblon
Rio de Janeiro.description: Elegant residential area with beachfront dining, family-friendly parks, and upscale apartments

Rio de Janeiro.name: Botafogo
Rio de Janeiro.description: Waterfront neighborhood with Sugarloaf Mountain views, shopping centers, and historic sites

Rio de Janeiro.name: Lapa
Rio de Janeiro.description: Historic bohemian district with samba clubs, colonial architecture, and vibrant nightlife

Rio de Janeiro.name: Santa Teresa
Rio de Janeiro.description: Hillside bohemian neighborhood with colonial mansions, art galleries, and panoramic city views

Rio de Janeiro.name: Centro
Rio de Janeiro.description: Historic city center with colonial buildings, theaters, and cultural institutions

Rio de Janeiro.name: Flamengo
Rio de Janeiro.description: Bayfront neighborhood with Flamengo Park, museums, and sweeping Guanabara Bay views

Rio de Janeiro.name: Urca
Rio de Janeiro.description: Seaside enclave at the base of Sugarloaf with quiet streets and small beaches

Rio de Janeiro.name: Tijuca
Rio de Janeiro.description: North Zone district with Tijuca National Park trails, markets, and local eateries
